select id from t_banner
and ( or pic_type like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or pic_url like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') )

SELECT tb.id, tb.`pic_url` AS picUrl, tb.`link_type` AS linkType, CASE WHEN tb.`link_type` =1 THEN '外部链接' WHEN tb.`link_type` =2 THEN '内部影片' END linkTypeName, tb.tag_id as tagId, (CASE WHEN tb.link_type=5 THEN (SELECT tgj.name FROM t_tags tgj WHERE tgj.id = tb.tag_id) END) AS tagName, tb.pic_from as picFrom, tb.link_url AS linkUrl FROM t_banner tb where 1=1 and tb.is_show=1
and tb.pic_type = #{picType}
